Topic.Title: Does the .quest file always run with the menus?

Posts.EditableText: I just downloaded quest yesterday, and I'm starting to read the documentation. I noticed that when I run the .quest file, it has menus for creating the game (File Edit Tools View Help), and the game window doesn't take up the whole screen. Is this the executable file I would give to a friend to check out my game? Is there a way to run it so it's just the game window? If so, where is this in the documentation?
